# Generated by binpac_quickstart

include(BroPlugin)

include_directories(BEFORE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR})

bro_plugin_begin(Bro MONGODB)
	bro_plugin_cc(MONGODB.cc Plugin.cc)
	bro_plugin_bif(events.bif)
	bro_plugin_pac(mongodb.pac mongodb-analyzer.pac mongodb-protocol.pac)
bro_plugin_end()
